802470.name: Never Stop Sneakin' - Original Soundtrack
802470.description:
Now you can never stop listenin’ to the finest collection of sneakin’ tracks, engineered and built from the ground up by the award-winning composers at HyperDuck SoundWorks!

Includes 8 tracks in MP3 format.

Music composed and performed by Chris Geehan & Dan-Byrne McCullough
Featuring the vocal talents of Elsie Lovelock

Track List:

  • 1. Never Stop Sneakin’ (04:28)
  • 2. Major Milestone (02:03)
  • 3. Edge of the Sneakblade (02:26)
  • 4. A Frank Exchange of Ideas (02:44)
  • 5. Line of Sight (03:22)
  • 6. Hack n’ Crack (02:45)
  • 7. Subterfuge (02:39)
  • 8. The Coming Storm (01:52)
802470.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
